name: Little Pretty Talk Tinker Bell Fashion Faries Princesses for iPhone & iPod Touch
name_original: Little Pretty Talk Tinker Bell Fashion Faries Princesses for iPhone & iPod Touch
description:
Hurray, you found me! It’s me…Baby Tinker Bell. Join my magical fairy world today.
Come play & talk with me, plus hear my story

INTERACT and HEAR MY STORY
I repeat back whatever you say
Hear my story about the other fairies, Captain Hook and Peter Pan -- over 100 things to say
Play with me at night, day, and morning for a totally new experience – 3 different scenes
Watch me fly around the forest of magical mushrooms
I cast fairy spells to help you -- Just ask!

MEET MY PET TOO !
“Buzz” is my helpful pet Bee and has lots to tell you also!
Buzz sometimes eats too much so watch out

MORNING, DAY and NIGHT
Fairies like me have nice things to say every morning, day and night
We live busy lives, so travel with us around the grove through the day

COMPATIBILITY
Compatible with all iPod Touch, iPhone and iPad models
iPod Touch 1, 2, 3 generation owners: Your earphones must have a microphone otherwise I cannot hear you.
